name: Lemon Sativa
description: Lemon Sativa is not your typical high-energy strain. While most sativas can be similar to a strong cup of coffee, Lemon Sativa tends to provide patients with a relaxing, heavy body sensation. As the name suggests, this strain has an aroma similar to a lemon drop candy. Lemon Sativa is great for patients who would like to relax while doing housework or catching up on other low-key tasks.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Energetic, Creative, Focused, Pain, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious, Dizzy
